Wednesday, 17 January 2024
$US$
I am.
Sign.

Business news

Inflation
Prices of goods and services in Len regions increased by 6 per cent per year
Consumer goods and services in Leningrad oblast increased by 6.04 per cent for 2023.
10:45, 17 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Cases
The stores in Petersburg are facing mass checks after the Wildberries fire.
All major warehouses in Petersburg may soon be filled by the controlling authorities. It was reported by the market.
10:10, 17 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Inflation
Eggs, cabbage and chicken. Petrostat called the most expensive products in Petersburg in the year.
PetrostatPublished data on consumer inflation in Petersburg for 2023.
10:09, 17 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Imports
Russia runs the risk of staying without a beer from Europe.
The Head of the Committee of the State Committee on Regional Policy and Local Self-Government, Alexei Didenko, addressed to Prime Minister Mikhail Misustin, requesting that consideration be given to the inclusion of beer and beer beverages in the list of agricultural and food that are prohibited from importing non-friendly countries.
08:38, 17 January 2024♪
Ilya Slove
Policy
Beglov suggested simplifying the requirements for strategic investment projects
The bill has already been approved by the Permanent Commission of the Legislative Assembly on Urban Planning, Land and Property. The first reading may take place next week.
08:33, 17 January 2024♪
Catherine Ryazanova
Environment
The Lenoblasty authorities demand that the ex-contractor of the Gazprom repair the dump.
The Court of Arbitration of Petersburg and Len regionali refused to appoint interim measures within the framework of the Regional Committee for State Environmental Oversight (CGEN) case to the GSP Magnet. The company is involved in construction, as well as in the construction and demolition of buildings.
08:28, 17 January 2024♪
Dmitri Marakulin, Evgeny Ivanova
Clothing
The garment producers in Petersburg grew up on the hammer.
The total turnover of clothing companies in Petersburg in January and November 2023 was 40.5 billion roubles, which is 31.2 per cent higher than in the same period in 2022 from the published Petrosta report. The total turnover of skin and skin products was 5.3 billion roubles (14.5 per cent).
08:18, 17 January 2024♪
Darya Dimitrieva
Crypts
Bitcoin passed the staphet stick.
After the good but long-awaited news about the registration of the mobile botscoin ETF, the most popular currency was cheap. But the quotations of her competitors, altcoins, went up sharp.
08:12, 17 January 2024♪
Alexander Pyrochav
Finish business out of SPB
The Petersburg "daughter" of the Finnish builder changed the owner
Fortrent Oy sold his unit in Petersburg.
08:11, 17 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Business
The number of IPs in Petersburg for the first time exceeds the number of yurlics
The total increase in the number of individual entrepreneurs reported on in the EGRIP register of the FFSF was 8 per cent.
08:03, 17 January 2024♪
Eugenia Petrov
Rolf case.
The nationalization of the Rolf, the Genprocuratura wants because of the corruption of her founder.
The founder of Rolf's car dealer was an illegal businessman as a member of the State Duma, and his company was a corruption tool. These arguments called Genprokuratura as grounds for removing Rolf to the State's revenue, say "I."
08:00, 17 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Waste management
The Hatsinah Ecotheson Park Residents were the Dumpster Operator's Dogs.
The company that manages the eco-industrial park, which builds the subsidiary structure of the Russian Environmental Operator PPC, the Ecocifra OSS in the Hutchin district of Len regions, has concluded agreements on the implementation of polymer granule production facilities, rubber coatings and reprocessing of construction waste from the construction of the building granules, and has described the LPD to the PPCR. The time frame for the establishment of facilities in the agreements was not specified, and was specified in the REA. Previously, the REO stated that the capacity of the environmental park in Len regions would be around 400,000 tons of waste per year.
07:52, 17 January 2024♪
Evgeny Ivanov
Ipothet
In 2023, each second complainant was denied a mortgage on the new site
The number of mortgage denials in October-December 2023 was 41 per cent. This was reported at the National Credit Stories Bureau (NBKI) without the Sbank data.
07:51, 17 January 2024♪
dp.ru
New technologies
The drones in Petersburg will be trained for 95-135 thousand roubles
GC Geoscan has announced the launch of a corporate training site for unmanned aerial systems (BAS) personnel in the civil sphere.
07:47, 17 January 2024♪
Karash Nogaeva
New developments
In Petersburg, builders sold 660 billion roubles per year
According to Rosreistra, in 2023 there were 64,500 equity contracts (DVs) in Petersburg, of which 499,000 were registered for housing. This is more than 2022, but less than 2018-20. The builders sold 660 billion roubles per year, a quarter more than in the past year (519.7 billion roubles).
07:40, 17 January 2024♪
Pavel Nikiforov
Reteil
Wildberries: part of the sellers refused compensation after the fire at the warehouse.
Some vendors decided to waive compensation for burnt goods in the warehouse.WildberriesShushharah.
07:33, 17 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Metro
The Petersburg Metropolitan reconstructs its Black Sea recreational base
Now the metropolitan is finishing the bidding for the price monitoring to develop the concept of the Metro recreational base. The study is undertaken to determine the initial maximum price of the contract. As a result of the work, it appears that the capacity of the base should be increased by a tighter structure.
07:28, 17 January 2024♪
Vadim Kuzmitz
Turkey
Banks in Turkey began to refuse to cooperate widely with Russians
Turkish banks began to refuse cooperation with Russians because of fear of sanctions. I've reported it with reference to sources in the financial market and in foreign trade.
07:18, 17 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Gas
Reuters: the first shipments from the CNG-2 Arctic are scheduled for late January
The first shipments of liquefied natural gas (LNG) from the CNG-2 project to Asia are scheduled for January.
17.29, 16 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Economy
New taxes and $110: Spring prepares surprises for the Russian economy
In mid-January, the turmoil was below $78 even after a new escalation in the Middle East caused its short-term growth. Prices are influenced by situational factors, but the schedule of recent months itself has encouraged the search for deeper reasons. Oil does not rise at a price despite the fact that OPEC has deliberately reduced production in all previous months and quarters.
17:18 16 January 2024♪
Darya Yudkevic

info.title: Prices of goods and services in Len regions increased by 6 per cent per year
